Tech Course Programs

UPSITF offers a broad selection of short courses designed to provide you a working set of IT skills that are responsive to the demands of the ever-changing and developing IT industry.

Schedules: Updates

  • CCNA Module 1 of 4 - starts on October 31
  • Project Management - starts on October 31
  • Web Development - starts on October 31

Other Services

CCT Corporate Customized Training

UPSITF can also customize its training modules according to the needs of its clients and partners.

TBC4K Tech Boot Camp for Kids + Teens

TBC4K aims to introduce students to a wide array of IT courses especially designed for kids and teens, including Robotics, Digital Arts, and more.

ICT4D ICT for Development

ICT4D Philippine Network is a loose network of academe partners that aims to engage government, IT industry, and developmental institutions in contributing to sustainable inclusive growth of the country.

+

  • Systems Audit and Portfolio Management
  • Executive Information Systems
  • Network Design and Administration
  • E-Learning
  • Software Systems and Application Development

Events

Youth Congress on Information Technology

Y4iT is an enabling event for todayâ€™s youth which it aspires to recognize young Filipinos as key drivers in the dynamic IT industry.

Academic Tours

Academic Tours provide students from all over the Philippines comprehensive information and communication technology (ICT) related seminars. Visiting students from other schools are provided with a quick course on technology topics of their choice.

Making IT Happen

The UP System Information Technology Foundation (UPSITF), Inc. is a non-government organization focused on the application of Information and Communication Technology for development. It partners with the UP Information Technology Development Center (UP ITDC) in providing various services such as Education Development, Research & Development, Software Engineering, and IT Project Management, among others.
